WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex issues and suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some issues and feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
So it would be really useful if the TypeScript compiler allowed the external hooks for the code generators that would be triggered by the compiler and provided with the code model as the input.

With this feature at hands one would save a lot of work of having write the boilerplate code implementing design patterns by hands rather than letting the code generator to do it.
WorkItem.Summary: Feature request: add hooks to the compiler for the code generators to be run at the compile time
